title: India Partnering Award: Collaboration on Diagnosis of Emerging Viruses (CoDEV)
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: This is an ongoing collaborative grant - to date, collaborative links have been established and applications for research funding are in development.
findingsText: This grant has only been running for less than one year and the aim is to establish strong research partnerships between the UK and India in the field of development of novel diagnostic assays for emerging viral diseases rather than conduct research. To date, initial meetings have taken place in India and collaborations established. Not applicable Agriculture, Food and Drink,Healthcare
